channel.title: Hmm...Never Say Yaoi or Love Triangle?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Hmm...Never Say Yaoi or Love Triangle?"

item.title: Re: Hmm...Never Say Yaoi or Love Triangle?
item.content:encoded: Yeah, ignore my previous post. I don't know what I was thinking.

item.title: Re: Hmm...Never Say Yaoi or Love Triangle?
item.content:encoded: Uh, Razorblades are 1000 ryo and Billy Buckets are 2500 ryo. And their drop rates are low. Never Say Yaoi does not use Billy 3 and Emo 3. That's the Ultimate Showdown.

item.title: Re: Hmm...Never Say Yaoi or Love Triangle?
item.content:encoded:
Also, since both Billy and Emosuke Lvl 3 still drop Billy Buckets (tradeable, 1000 Ryo) and Razorblades (non-tradeable, 2500 Ryo), not to mention their other drops, Never Say Yaoi is probably the better team for getting money (though it would be even better with the HoClaus).

Of course, if you can make Never Say Yaoi, you can't make Crazy Love Triangle anymore.

item.title: Re: Hmm...Never Say Yaoi or Love Triangle?
item.content:encoded: For range and strength, Ultimate Showdown probably is the best. For farming, other more specialized teams have their uses.

item.title: Re: Hmm...Never Say Yaoi or Love Triangle?
item.content:encoded: lol if u checked the bonuses it gives u can say its probably better than everything else

item.title: Re: Hmm...Never Say Yaoi or Love Triangle?
Re: Hmm...Never Say Yaoi or Love Triangle?
item.content:encoded: Is Ultimate Showdown Bonus better than Never Say Yaoi?

item.title: Re: Hmm...Never Say Yaoi or Love Triangle?
item.content:encoded: I use Never Say Yaoi. The range bonus makes it really good for difficult missions and I personally think it's better for farming missions because you get Emosuke drops rather than Pinky drops. The +2 stamina is nice, but I'd rather at least have a chance of getting a razor blade and a decent chance of getting an Emo Rock CD or Hot Picture of Emoksuke, which if nothing else can be sold for a decent amount of ryo.

item.title: Re: Hmm...Never Say Yaoi or Love Triangle?
item.content:encoded: both of them are pretty good teams, although i think u should use the never say yaoi team just for the razor blades

item.title: Re: Hmm...Never Say Yaoi or Love Triangle?
item.content:encoded: Love Triangle is superior, in my opinion, especially if your village has the Sand Demon Monument.

item.title: Re: Hmm...Never Say Yaoi or Love Triangle?
item.content:encoded: Personally, I think Love Triangle is the better farming team. Yaoi is a better team for the hard missions though, because of the range gain.

item.title: Hmm...Never Say Yaoi or Love Triangle?
item.content:encoded:
Both are fairly balanced. Yaoi One gives you better ninjutsu and a bigger chakra discount, as well as one more range. On the other hand, Triangle is a 2 stamina discount on missionsâ€¦

So hard to pick >_<
